data.message: How nice that you enjoyed the Argentina . I had wanted to come see you , but I could not. Argentina is a place you waited a long time and was worth . I could not enjoy that moment , but I want you to come back and we will celebrate twice. Hopefully there is a second chance for you to come and to fulfill a dream of seeing you live . That's what I want, I hope you come back soon and hope to see you , you're my idol Marshall, I respect you a lot and you're the best rapper on the planet Earth.
